biography.content:
Shirley Holmlund has a Bachelor of Education Degree and Diploma in Educational Media & Technology. Her career as teacher and Media Specialist, gave her the setting for serving the educational community in student learning. She pursued learning strategies, and elevated her awareness in her interactions with others.

Ms. Holmlund is a lifelong seeker of truth in reality and in spiritual awareness.  She has a gift to affect change, in a positive manner. She studied with transformational leaders; Energy Medicine modalities and personal development. No modality satisfied her quest.

In 2011 Ms. Holmlund was introduced to Mr. Mahendra Trivedi, who provided the focus she was seeking. He can harness universal energy, called the Trivedi Effect, to affect change in living organisms and non-living materials.  This intelligent energy optimizes the potential, whatever the need, changing its characteristics and behaviors, even remotely. Mr. Trivedi has conducted 4000 scientific experiments, authenticating the Trivedi Effect in areas of agriculture, biotechnology, genetics, cancer, materials science, and microbiology.  

Ms. Holmlund had profound results from Guruji’s biofield healing treatments. She experienced deeper sleep, peace, calmness, awareness, and satisfaction in life.  She enrolled Mr. Trivedi’s Healing Master’s Program.  He has tested student ability to harness this life force energy, to affect change in mice cell biology. One experiment was conducted with peers and another, solely, was on skin conditions. These results are being tested in peer-review journals. 

Mr. Trivedi has connected science and spirituality, with scientific validation.  His research continues, and his impact on the world and higher consciousness is limitless!
